      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Creating randomizely the 1st generation For each chromosome: Exchanging the position of elements in a chromosome Calculating the fitness value for it.

        Orders population of chromosome is sorted according to the their costs in descending order

      • removeBadChromosomes

        void removeBadChromosomes()
        Removing the chromosome that are less fit cost. The parameter to decide How many chromosomes are removed is defined in Parameter.java

        tsp.Parameter.bestCostRate
